TrafficFilter.Name: TBD name 5

ServiceLevelProfile.Name: GR1_to_TA1_SLP_50_0
ServiceLevelProfile.Description: RED Qdisc for Class 2 "LTC Delivery" traffic

ServiceLevelProfile.Name: GR1_to_TA1_SLP_1_303

TrafficFilter.Name: TBD name 6

ServiceLevelProfile.Name: GR1_to_TA1_SLP_70_0
